premiumTab.mainDescriptionFemale: For you, access to the main chat features is free!
premiumTab.mainDescriptionSubscribed: Thank you for your subscription! You are enjoying all premium benefits.
premiumTab.mainDescriptionDefault: Get instant access to chat partners without queues. Premium users enjoy priority matching and enhanced features.
premiumTab.subscribedMessageTitle: You have an active Premium subscription!
premiumTab.femaleAccessMessageText: Enjoy all the delights of communication without restrictions.
premiumTab.activatePremiumDescription: Get the most out of our service with exclusive features.

premiumPlan.name: Premium
premiumPlan.unlockFeaturesText: Unlock all features and chat without limits!

antiskip.name: Anti-Skip
antiskip.description: Never miss an interesting chat partner again!

allAccessories.name: All Accessories
allAccessories.description: Get the full set of exclusive accessories to personalize your profile and chat!

premiumTab.cancellationPolicy: Cancel your subscription at any time. Secure payments via Stripe.

whyPremiumFeatures.title: Instant Matching
whyPremiumFeatures.description: No more waiting - connect with girls instantly.

whyPremiumFeatures.title: Verified Users
whyPremiumFeatures.description: Chat with verified users for an authentic experience.

whyPremiumFeatures.title: Exclusive Features
whyPremiumFeatures.description: Enjoy additional features like friend lists and special badges.

genderVerification.title: Gender Verification
genderVerification.desc: We need to verify your gender to provide the appropriate experience. Please ensure you're clearly visible in the camera.
genderVerification.aiNote: Our AI will continuously verify your gender during the session to maintain platform integrity.
genderVerification.cameraRequiredDesc: Please enable your camera to verify your gender.
